data.title: Sakura Ichi is now Shinbashi Japanese Restaurant
data.text: Was staying in the Pomona area for just a short time, and really craved some Japanese food.  The area, in my opinion, wasn't the nicest, so I wasn't sure about trying this place.  The food in this restaurant was exceptionally good, and the staff was very friendly.  I was with a friend, and we ordered an assortment of items, both cooked and raw.  We ordered…baked mussels that were our favorite item…jalapeños stuffed with crab meat and cream cheese, not really traditional Japanese food, but tasty…rock shrimp tempura was delicious….and then the sushi we ordered was yellow tail, tuna, snapper, eel and egg.  Everything was fresh and delicious.  I knew the sushi chefs were not Japanese, and asked my server, and he said they were from Taiwan.  Everyone was very cordial.
